Habitat-Biology: benthic; endemic to Gulf of Mexico; estuarine; soft substrate (muds, sands, clays)
Overall geographic range: known only from the Gulf of Mexico
Source: Shirley, T. C. 2009. Kinorhyncha of the Gulf of Mexico, Pp. 1129–1132 in Felder, D.L. and D.K. Camp (eds.), Gulf of Mexico–Origins, Waters, and Biota. Biodiversity. Texas A&M Press, College Station, Texas.
Author: Chitwood

Habitat-Biology: benthic; estuarine; soft substrate (muds, sands, clays); inshore
Source: Shirley, T. C. 2009. Kinorhyncha of the Gulf of Mexico, Pp. 1129–1132 in Felder, D.L. and D.K. Camp (eds.), Gulf of Mexico–Origins, Waters, and Biota. Biodiversity. Texas A&M Press, College Station, Texas.
